data.description: Provides training and support for Peer Mentors of the Bradley Learning Community. Helps improve leadership and facilitation skills for Peer Mentors, whose primary service obligations include co-facilitating a section of the Bradley Roundtable seminar and arranging programming for the Bradley Learning Community. Introduces new techniques for working with small groups. Special attention will be paid to the research on the developmental and academic needs of first-year college students Encourages students to develop their professional skills. Serves as an opportunity for guided reflection, as part of the community-based learning model.
data.title: BRADLEY PEER MENTOR COURSE
